title: did relative grading happen for mechanics in chem cycle sem 1 before if yes how marks did it increase to...

comments.body: I have never such regarded 1st years till now
Nobody knows except the COE and the Chancellors (Vice, Pro, Pro Vice?)
The Chancellors aren't usually involved in paper corrections lol. The COE and profs will know.
Maybe not the chancellor, but profs definitely don't have a clue about moderation - source: I spoke to a bunch of profs about it
